Sentencas: Multi-objective optimization is one of the most effective tools for the decision support system.
Titulo: Mixed-integer non-linear programming (MINLP) multi-period multi-objective optimization of advanced power plant through gasification of municipal solid waste (MSW)

Sentencas: This study aims to optimize the gasification of municipal solid waste (MSW) for advanced power plant.
Titulo: Mixed-integer non-linear programming (MINLP) multi-period multi-objective optimization of advanced power plant through gasification of municipal solid waste (MSW)

Sentencas: MSW gasifier is simulated using Aspen Plus v11 to produce syngas, to be fed into power generation technologies.
Titulo: Mixed-integer non-linear programming (MINLP) multi-period multi-objective optimization of advanced power plant through gasification of municipal solid waste (MSW)

Sentencas: Four power generation technologies are selected, solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine, gas engine, and steam turbine.
Titulo: Mixed-integer non-linear programming (MINLP) multi-period multi-objective optimization of advanced power plant through gasification of municipal solid waste (MSW)

Sentencas: Mixed-integer non-linear programming (MINLP) multi-objective optimization is developed to provide an optimal solution for minimum levelized cost of electricity (LCOE) and minimum CO2eq emissions.
Titulo: Mixed-integer non-linear programming (MINLP) multi-period multi-objective optimization of advanced power plant through gasification of municipal solid waste (MSW)

Sentencas: The optimization is conducted with a s-constraint method using GAMS through time periods of 2020-2050.
Titulo: Mixed-integer non-linear programming (MINLP) multi-period multi-objective optimization of advanced power plant through gasification of municipal solid waste (MSW)

Sentencas: Decision variables include gasifier temperature, steam to carbon ratio, and power generation technologies.
Titulo: Mixed-integer non-linear programming (MINLP) multi-period multi-objective optimization of advanced power plant through gasification of municipal solid waste (MSW)

Sentencas: The optimization result demonstrates that the lower steam to carbon ratio gives lower LCOE and higher CO2eq emissions, and temperature variation gives no significant impact on LCOE and as it increases, CO2eq emission is reduced.
Titulo: Mixed-integer non-linear programming (MINLP) multi-period multi-objective optimization of advanced power plant through gasification of municipal solid waste (MSW)

Sentencas: It demonstrates that a gas turbine is the best option for generating electricity from 2020 to 2040 and beyond 2040 SOFC is the best option.
Titulo: Mixed-integer non-linear programming (MINLP) multi-period multi-objective optimization of advanced power plant through gasification of municipal solid waste (MSW)
